stimulusHtml: Suppose f'(5)=3 and f''(x)<0 for all x in the closed interval 5 ≤ x ≤ 8. Use the line tangent to the graph of f at x=5 to show that f(7) ≤ 4. Use the secant line for the graph of f on 5 ≤ x ≤ 8 to show that f(7)≥4/3 .

features.html: Let f be a function that is twice differentiable for all real numbers. The table above gives values of f for selected points in the closed interval 2 ≤ x ≤ 13.
